title: Cape Coast Castle, Ghana
description: Visit the historical Cape Coast Castle by booking online through the Ghana Museums and Monuments Board website or via tour companies offering guided trips from Accra or Takoradi.

title: Olumo Rock, Nigeria
description: Book a guided tour to Olumo Rock through local tour agencies or walk-in at the entrance. Online booking is available through NigeriaTourism.ng or local travel apps.

title: Pendjari National Park, Benin
description: To book a wildlife safari in Pendjari National Park, contact Benin National Parks Authority or international platforms like Viator and TripAdvisor for complete packages.

title: Lake Retba (Lac Rose), Senegal
description: Book a boat ride and guided visit through local travel agencies in Dakar or directly at the lake. Airbnb Experiences and GetYourGuide also offer packages.

title: Grand-Bassam Beach, Ivory Coast
description: Reserve beachfront stays and activities via booking platforms like Booking.com or Expedia. Some hotels offer custom packages that include guided city tours.

title: Ouidah Voodoo Festival, Benin
description: Book festival tours through Benin cultural tourism sites or African Roots Travel. Tours include accommodation, guides, and cultural immersion activities.

title: Kakum National Park, Ghana
description: Book a canopy walk tour in advance through the Kakum National Park office or licensed tour companies. Group tours from Accra are also available with transportation.

title: Abidjan City Tour, Ivory Coast
description: Book city tours online through TripAdvisor, Airbnb Experiences, or local operators. Most packages include transportation, English-speaking guides, and meals.

title: Gorée Island, Senegal
description: Ferries to Gorée Island depart from Dakar port. Tickets can be purchased on-site or booked as part of a guided tour. Includes museum access and historical site visits.

title: Zuma Rock, Nigeria
description: Tourists can book through Abuja-based travel agencies. Some hiking tours are available through local adventure groups and hotel concierge services.
